body_content.explanation: something whose result could be good or bad but is impossible to predict or control, because so much chance is involved:
examples: Almost every aspect of the music business is a crapshoot.
It's hard to accept that life can be a crapshoot, where bad things happen to good people for no reason.
Starting up a new magazine is a crap shoot at the best of times.
Predicting the outcome of the tournament is pretty much a crap-shoot.
